english.segment1: I waited patiently for the Lord. He inclined and heard my cry. He brought me up out of the pit. Out of the miry clay
english.segment2: I will sing, sing a new song. I will sing, sing a new song
english.segment3: How long to sing this song?. How long to sing this song?. How long..how long..how long.. How long..to sing this song
english.segment4: He set my feet upon a rock. And made my footsteps firm. Many will see. Many will see and fear
english.segment5: I will sing, sing a new song. I will sing, sing a new song. I will sing, sing a new song. I will sing, sing a new song
english.segment6: How long to sing this song?. How long to sing this song?. How long..how long..how long..
